entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
